section.p: Your starting Max Wounds is 4. If your Toughness is positive, add that as well.

ul.li: Dead eyes, charming eyes, angry eyes
Black bodysuit, plain clothes, dirty rags
Buzz cut, elaborate hair, tattooed head
Slim body, athletic body, huge body

drive-description.p: Make a mess of a kill to intimidate others.
Kill an enemy before they even know they're in danger.
Leap into danger before a plan is formed.

move-description.p: When you get close to your target to make a surprise attack, roll+Ag if you use stealth or speed, or roll+Fel if you use deception or charm. On a 10+ choose two. On a 7-9 choose one.

ul.li: You don't get into melee with them
You deal your damage plus an extra damage die
You create an advantage, +1 forward to you or an ally acting on it
Reduce their defense by 1 until they repair it

move-description.p: When you stay still to remain inconspicuous as someone passes by, roll+Fel. On a 10+ choose two, on a 7-9 choose one:
When you move through the shadows across a dangerous or difficult path, roll+Ag. On a 10+ choose three, on a 7-9 choose two:

ul.li: You leave no trace of your passage
You move with near superhuman speed and grace
You are not harmed or hindered while you move

section.p: Whenever you level up you can take one of the following moves, or one of the moves from the general Advanced Moves list.

move-description.p: When you roll Unsuspecting Strike you always prevent your target from raising the alarm, describe how.
When using a precise or hand weapon, your Unsuspecting Strike deals an extra +1d6 damage.
When you're outnumbered, you have +1 defense against melee attacks.
When you stay still to remain inconspicuous as someone passes by, roll+Fel. On a 10+ choose two, on a 7-9 choose one:
When you use Unsuspecting Strike you may roll with precision.
